articles.description: Barcelona are on the brink of winning La Liga after responding to a heartbreaking Champions League exit by beating Real Madrid 4-3 - and their long-term future looks good too.
articles.title: 'Suffering makes us strong' - the new Barcelona set for greatness

articles.description: United's appalling finish to the campaign hit another low note at Old Trafford as they lost to a West Ham side that had failed to win any of their previous eight games.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: I need to go if Manchester United start next season like this says boss

articles.description: Nottingham Forest boss Nuno Espirito Santo plays down owner Evangelos Marinakis' post-match intervention following the 2-2 draw against Leicester.
articles.title: Nuno defends Marinakis' post-match intervention after Forest drop points against Leicester

articles.description: As Trent Alexander-Arnold is booed by a section of the Liverpool fans after appearing for the first time since announcing he is to leave in the summer, BBC Sport looks at the reaction.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: Liverpool right-back booed against Arsenal

articles.description: Inter Milan end Sunday one point behind Napoli after beating Torino,  while the Serie A leaders were held at home by Genoa.
articles.title: Torino 0-2 Inter Milan: Inter close gap on Napoli after rain-delayed win

articles.description: How expensive will loss at Newcastle United be for Chelsea and head coach Enzo Maresca, asks chief football writer Phil McNulty?
articles.title: How expensive will Chelsea's Premier League loss at Newcastle prove to be?

articles.description: Mikel Arteta labels Arsenal's first-half performance in their 2-2 draw with Liverpool "unacceptable".
articles.title: Arsenal first half performance against Liverpool unacceptable - Arteta

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Eze, Watkins, Tonali, Welbeck, Munoz, Ramsdale

articles.description: Nottingham Forest and Chelsea have dropped points in the race for the Champions League - so who needs what?
articles.title: Who will qualify for the Champions League, Europa and Conference League permutations

articles.description: Crystal Palace gear up for Saturday's FA Cup final against Manchester City with a derby victory against Tottenham that helps them equal their record Premier League points tally.
articles.title: Dominant Palace down Tottenham before FA Cup final
